idp_mesh_name.lang_idp_mesh_name_title: ノードはどこにありますか？
idp_mesh_name.lang_idp_mesh_name_content1: ノードに名前を付けると、設定にアクセスする際にノードを区別するのに役立ちます。
idp_mesh_name.lang_idp_mesh_name_content3: 例: キッチン、リビング、寝室、など
idp_mesh_name.lang_idp_mesh_name_content4: Naming nodes helps you tell them apart when accessing settings.
idp_mesh_name.lang_idp_mesh_name_error1: The Node name cannot be blank!
idp_mesh_name.lang_idp_mesh_name_error2: The node name can only contain alphanumberic characters and dashes.
idp_mesh_name.lang_idp_mesh_name_error3: The node name must start with a letter.
